title: Constant 100 Ping
body: I haven't  really played League in a while and I never remembered having bad ping in every game. I started playing again last week, and experienced my first 100 ping game and thought it must have been a connection problem that will fix itself. I played again today and same thing happens. I don't know what to do. If any of you experience this problem and have a solution please provide your fix.

replies.body:
I wonder if something might have changed with your network settings or it could actually just be due to the current internet traffic or issues with your ISP. 

Do me a favor and run through the steps on the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to cover the basics first, and let me know if none of those steps help much after testing in a custom game.
